title.rendered: Dr. Alan Walker, Honorary Fellow of the Canadian Chopin Society

content.rendered:
The Canadian Chopin Society was proud to recognize Dr. Alan Walker as the first Honorary Fellow of the Canadian Chopin Society on March 3, 2013. Dr. Walker is author of a definitive three-volume prize-winning biography of Franz Liszt, and has been awarded the Commemorative Plaque of the Budapest Liszt Society for his contributions to Liszt scholarship.

Buy the definitive three-volume prize-winning biography of Franz Liszt here.
